title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of hotels, with a total of 5 data points.
Overall Number of hotels has increased over the Year
Number of hotels is rapidly increasing from 250_rooms_or_more to Less_than_25_rooms.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year From_25_to_99_rooms and Less_than_25_rooms.
Max Number of hotels about 12170.0 was recorded at Year Less_than_25_rooms
Min Number of hotels about 679.0 was recorded at Year 250_rooms_or_more
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of hotels with a total of 5 data points. The chart has one significant trend.
This trend is increasing which exists from Less_than_25_rooms to 250_rooms_or_more.
